name: Reconnaissance
description:
***The web build is being buggy so until I can get unity to cooperate, please download the game***

Here's my submission for the Historically Accurate Game Jam 3 - with the theme of the 'Cold War'

Objective

During the Cold War, the United States of America launched several reconnaissance missions over Cuba; in an effort to assess the threat of the nuclear warheads by the USSR, present in the region. 

Take control of a 1960s U2-reconnaissance aircraft! The mission is to fly over the suspected nuclear missile silo bases and take photographs while avoiding the missiles that are targeting you every second.

Make sure you look at the fuel gauge, as you need to keep enough fuel to finish the mission. The mission will span over 3 areas, and a total of 6 photographs are required for completion. 

Good luck out there!

Controls WThrottle ( Consumes more fuel)A & DSteer Left and Right Note from the Developer

Unfortunately, due to the time constraints, I was unable to add sound and music to the game, but I am working on it and will add it to the next update. I hope you don't encounter any game-breaking bugs, and if you do then please leave a feedback on the comments. 

I will highly appreciate any feedback and thank you for playing my game

Future Updates:
  • Better Art
  • Better Particle effects
  • Sound effects 
  • Missile Warning System
